DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess safety tolerability ascend single oral dos bosutinib administer multiple dos ketoconazole provide pharmacokinetic profile bosutinib administer multiple dos ketoconazole food healthy adult subject .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Ascending Single-Dose Of Bosutinib Administered With Multiple Doses Of Ketoconazole To Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : 1 . Men woman nonchildbearing potential ( WONCBP ) age 18 50 year inclusive study day 1 . WONCBP may include either surgically sterile ( hysterectomy and/or oophorectomy ) postmenopausal ≥ 1 year ( folliclestimulating hormone [ FSH ] ≥ 38 mIU/mL ) must negative serum pregnancy test result administration test article . 2 . Body mass index ( BMI ) range 18.0 30.0 kg/m2 body weight ≥ 50 kg . 3 . Healthy determine investigator basis screen evaluation . Exclusion criterion : 1 . Family history QT prolongation , syncope , seizure , unexplained cardiac relate death . 2 . Presence history disorder may prevent successful completion study . 3 . Any significant cardiovascular , hepatic , renal , respiratory , gastrointestinal , endocrine , immunologic , dermatologic , hematologic , neurologic , psychiatric disease .
